channel.title: How do you get out of character making screen (::character, how do you get out?
channel.description: I didnt like how i looked so i just did ::character and now i have no idea how to get outta the screen. I tried clicking accept, doesnt work.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 21, 2006, 07:09:22 PM[/size][hr]3 views, no posts.. :(
